Description:
Impressive Town Residence In Enviable Position
In a rare boutique allotment (1 of only 7) in Melbourne's coveted inner-north, this immaculately presented, impressive town residence enjoys the highest standard of contemporary living. Flooded with natural light with a northerly orientation, the expansive interior comprises 2 bedrooms with BIRs (main with ensuite), a large open plan living and dining level with well-appointed galley kitchen (stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances) and gleaming timber floors that open through wall-to-wall sliding doors that seamlessly blend the family room with the north-facing courtyard and BBQ area, central bathroom with separate bathtub, separate laundry and powder room. Just a leisurely stroll to Darling Gardens, Ramsden Street Reserve or Merri Creek Trail, the home closely located to Clifton Hill Station, Eastern Freeway, great schools and an abundance of popular cafes, bars and restaurants of nearby Queens Parade and Westgarth Village. Features include heating and cooling, secure intercom entrance and OSP with storage cage and bike rack.
Insights: 4/94 Roseneath Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2018 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Brand-new, architect designed and meticulously appointed
Architecturally designed, this elegant brand-new 2 level residence offers light filled low-maintenance living in a secluded precinct close to Queens Parade shops, transport, Darling Gardens and local schools. With a distinctive recycled brick fa√ßade and garden entry, it opens to a versatile sitting room/guest BR and powder room, leading back to a bespoke kitchen/laundry with Smeg appliances and integrated fridge, open to a good-sized living and dining room with study alcove. Two double bedrooms on the upper level (main with private balcony) are separated by a sleek bathroom and second powder room. Including a courtyard with easy off-street ROW parking via roller door, this superbly appointed home also features wide oak floorboards, washing machine/dryer included, generous storage, premium carpets, custom timber cabinetry throughout and split-system air conditioning. Note: No Body Corporate. Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 8a Peckville Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2018 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Instantly liveable, loads of potential!
As quirky as it is stylish, this quaint workers cottage circa 1890 has evolved into a cosy two bedroom freestanding home with loads of period detail. The open space to the north fills the house with light and presents ample opportunity to extend or renovate STCA. There is a deep garden to the rear with ROW. At the end of a cul de sac, the quiet location belies the easy access to Hoddle St and the Eastern Freeway, with recreation facilities, shops, cafes and public transport just moments away. Nelson Alexander Pty. Ltd.
Insights: 14 Peckville Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2018 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Presented With Approved Plans/Permit For The Ultimate Renovation
In this superb pocket, the attractive period profile of this elevated terrace is set to introduce an outstanding future floorplan and a fabulous inner-city lifestyle. Featuring north-facing rear courtyard and side/rear ROW, the potential of this inviting home is immediately evident with a classic layout and high ceilings ready to realize these outstanding plans (or your alternative) for a two-level revamp of contemporary style and quality. Located just footsteps to the Darling Gardens, Clifton Hill station, Queens Parade Village and school, this two bedroom Victorian's is poised for perfection with plans featuring three fitted bedrooms (upstairs parents' retreat including study and ensuite), open-plan family area with spacious kitchen, two bathrooms, laundry, polished timber and concrete floors plus north-rear courtyard garden and entertainment terrace.
Insights: 24 Noone Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2018 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Delightful Period Home With Parkside Address
Behind its white picket fence and Japanese maple front garden, this renovated double-front Edwardian boasts the preferred northerly rear aspect in a quiet family oriented position with Quarries Park and Merri Creek Trail at the end of the street. The light-filled interior with polished timber floors throughout comprises 3 bedrooms with BIRs (main with double-shower ensuite), an expansive open plan family room extension with high-ceilings, OFP and well large kitchen (stone bench tops, Fisher & Paykel dishwasher, ample storage) that opens through double doors to the private north-facing entertainment deck and rear garden with quintessential lemon tree and flexible outdoor shed or studio with WC. The home is completed by a central bathroom, powder room, Euro laundry, attic storage, ducted heating/cooling and security system. Central to several parklands and nature trails, the home enjoys an idyllic lifestyle with easy access to Clifton Hill train station, Queens Parade shops/trams, excellent schools and just a short stroll to Westgarth Village restaurants, boutiques and cinema and the nightlife of vibrant Smith and Brunswick Streets.
Insights: 40 Caroline Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2018 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Immaculate light-filled design opposite Darling Gardens
Classic 70s style! In an architecturally significant well-maintained block moments from Queens Parade and all transport options, this expansive apartment with light from three sides, parkland and stunning CBD views, offers two large double bedrooms (BIRs), a spacious living room open to dining zone and balcony, generous well-equipped kitchen and updated bathroom/laundry with overbath shower. Description:
Elegant & Light Victorian Beauty
Beautiful landscaped garden surroundings and glorious northerly orientation add a gentle, captivating nature to the elegance and sophistication of this sympathetically renovated, light-filled Victorian. An idyllic setting for high-quality living in a quiet village location, this perfectly modernized home extends over two levels with double-glazing, hydronic heating and air-conditioning providing absolute comfort while a leafy courtyard garden with entertainment deck is ideal for secluded alfresco enjoyment. Near Yarra Bend Park-Merri Creek trail, Queens Parade cafes, schools and Clifton Hill station, this attractive residence features three sizable bedrooms (BIRs; parents' retreat with ensuite and study area), superb living room (OFP), family/meals area, excellent Smeg/Bosch stone kitchen, two stylish bathrooms, European laundry, high heritage ceilings and polished Tallowwood floors.
Insights: 57 Dwyer Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2018 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Living in Parkside Address
Directly opposite the Merri Creek Trail and Yarra Bend Park, this immaculately presented tuck-pointed brick Edwardian boasts a desirable blend of rich period detail with contemporary touches. The generously proportioned rooms and high pressed-metal ceilings give an immediate sense of space and grandeur throughout the light filled interior that comprises 4 double bedrooms including a first floor main with BIRs, WIR, ensuite, air-conditioning and private treetop terrace, an expansive bookshelf-lined formal living room, flexible formal sitting/home office or 4th bedroom, well-appointed kitchen with stone bench top, Smeg and Miele appliances including integrated espresso machine, Qasair rangehood and large informal dining area that opens to the tranquil rear garden with manicured garden beds, established trees, work shed and remote double carport via ROW. The home is completed by a central bathroom with separate bathtub and heated towel rack, Euro laundry, powder room, enormous attic storage, hydronic heating, video intercom, security system and is suffuse with period lustre including original OFPs, pendant light fittings and timber floors throughout. Located in a quiet, family oriented position, the home enjoys easy access to Heidelberg Road and Queens Parade shops and transport, Clifton Hill train station, the Eastern Freeway and many fine schools.
Insights: 62 The Esplanade, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2018 and 10 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Remarkably rare double-fronted discovery. Auction CONFIRMED this Saturday 19th May at 1:00pm
Wide elevated frontage and north-facing rear garden with ROW frame this landmark Clifton Hill opening - a 4 bedroom, double-fronted Federation residence retaining its classic Art Nouveau character on 373sqm (approx.). Exquisite Wunderlich ceilings in differing designs and ornate open fireplaces feature throughout this long-held home's unrenovated interior ready to inspire a stunning contemporary transformation. Superbly situated near Yarra parklands, Darling Gardens, cafes, schools, shops, trains and the city; this largely original home includes central hallway, living room, sitting room or 4th bedroom, 2 kitchens, bathroom, laundry, workshed/storage and garage. With fresh ideas and plenty of polish, this heritage home is destined to deliver an outstanding future lifestyle.
Insights: 107 Roseneath Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2018 and 10 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
An Edwardian gem: exclusive parkland location, large land & exciting potential
This elegant block-fronted residence, offered for the first time in 45 years, offers comfortable family living with sensational scope to renovate and extend to create a masterpiece in Clifton Hill's most coveted street. Sited on an impressive block (485m2 approx) the home enjoys an uninterrupted tranquil outlook to hectares of Yarra Bend parkland. With high ceilings and abundant natural light, it comprises a generous entry foyer with double doors to a spacious living room featuring craftsman-built timber panelling, leadlights and an ornate fireplace. A large retro kitchen/meals area opens to a sunroom with a deep garden aspect. Three double bedrooms (one with OFP), polished floorboards, a neat bathroom and laundry/2nd WC complete this welcoming residence, which includes gas heating, ample outdoor storage, a studio/workshop and easy ROW-access off street parking. Stroll to sought after schools, the Merri Creek trail, Quarries Park playground and transport, and enjoy the vibrancy of Clifton Hill Village!
Insights: 38 The Esplanade, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2018 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
LUXURIOUS SPACE IN A BRILLIANT LOCATION - PRICE REDUCTION
Wonderfully positioned with beautiful Merri Creek Trail and Yarra Bend Park 3 min walk away, and within 10 min walk of train, tram and buses, discover a world of quiet, spacious executive living in this huge tri-level modern residence. Encompassing 100sq m of space on each level, this residence has the large open rooms, flowing spaces and storage of the best new architecture. The ground floor has a large bedroom, multi function room, laundry, bathroom, and garage. This floor is ideal for a home office, or for teenager or guest room. Separate entrance at rear. The main floor encompasses a huge open plan entertaining area, with chef's kitchen (Miele appliances, 3 ovens) 3m caesarstone island bench, plus enormous pantry and storage. The entertaining area leads to an attractive north facing terrace with district views. This is the perfect entertaining venue, to host all sorts of parties and family gatherings. The top floor is a quiet relaxing oasis of only 2 bedrooms with ensuites. The master suite is over 50 sqm with a sunny north facing balcony, enormous walk in robes, plus a luxury bathroom (double shower, bath, double vanity and storage). The second bedroom also has ensuite bathroom, with views to CBD. There is also a study computer area. The property has intercom security, security alarm, air con heating and cooling, timber floors, and easy access to CBD, universities and schools. A truly captivating and engaging environment, bathed in light, with two car parking, and access to all the benefits that true inner city living provides.
Insights: 167 Noone Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2018 and 10 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Unexpected pleasures, uncompromising quality
Expect the unexpected and get set to entertain in this beautiful double-fronted Hawthorn brick Victorian home. A stunning 2 storey renovation blends heritage character and the free-flowing extension revolves around a central courtyard that is capped by a secluded top-floor parents' retreat featuring versatile lounge/study and private alfresco deck with BBQ, bar fridge and 8-seat spa. Located just a short stroll to Yarra parklands, cafes, schools and train station, this captivating home offers 3 fitted bedrooms, spectacular dining room (marble FP, picture window), family living room, bifold doors to courtyard, premium kitchen (Smeg stove, dual-drawer dishwasher), 2 bathrooms (huge main - freestanding bath), laundry, hydronic heating, a-c, double-glazing, OFPs and remote-control garage.
Insights: 86 Roseneath Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2018 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Outstanding size & ground-floor convenience
It's not only the extra space and substance that's immediately evident, it's this ground-floor apartment's capacity to deliver on all fronts from easy single-level living to an exceptionally accessible lifestyle. Set in a landmark warehouse conversion architect designed when size mattered more, this impressive modern home offers direct Grant Street entrance and frontage coupled with express internal access to secure car park space on title. Oriented east and north to maximize natural light in a central village position near Darling Gardens, Queens Parade, recreation centre and train station, the layout includes open-plan living and dining area, large bedroom with loads of storage, kitchen with stainless-steel appliances, bright bathroom, European laundry, intercom and Siemens panel heating.

Description:
Sun-filled sanctuary, exciting Yarra precinct
At the river-end of the village; a peaceful and private north-rear position creates an idyllic lifestyle sanctuary for this light-filled modern townhouse. Including internal remote-control garage with 2-car stacker, this superbly-appointed home reveals an abundance of style and space, flexibility and flow, for excellent indoor-outdoor living with minimal upkeep. Wander to nearby cafes, Yarra parkland, trails and train station from this sensational home featuring 3 fitted bedrooms (main with ensuite; huge 3rd or office/lounge), impressive living and dining opening to entertainment terrace (auto retractable awning), outstanding Smeg/Bosch stone kitchen, 2.5 bathrooms, laundry, heating/cooling, ducted vacuum, alarm system, NBN and sunny courtyard garden.
Insights: 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Contemporary Inner-City Lifestyle With Family Credentials
Over three impressive levels flooded with natural light from its preferred north-facing aspect, architecturally designed by Rothelowman, this home epitomises the contemporary family lifestyle with an idyllic blend of low-maintenance living in the heart of the inner-city with generously proportioned room sizes and excellent access to many fine schools and parklands. Suffuse with neutral tones, the immaculately presented interior comprises a ground floor home office with adjacent retreat area and powder room ideal for home businesses, 3 bedrooms with BIRs (main with private balcony and floor-to-ceiling tiled ensuite with concealed cistern toilet) while the top floor boasts a dedicated living and dining level serviced by the well-appointed kitchen (Miele cookware, integrated Fisher & Paykel dishwasher, stone bench tops) that opens through wall-to-wall concertina doors to the expansive north-west facing outdoor area with stunning views across the CBD and urban skyline and covered outdoor dining area. The home is completed by a gleaming central bathroom, tremendous remote DLUG with I/A, storage room and separate laundry (entry via Council Street), OFP, heating, air-conditioning, timber floors and video intercom entry. Enjoying a true inner-city lifestyle, the home is located central to popular Smith Street and Queens Parade trams, shops, cafes and bars, Edinburgh and Darling Gardens, Fitzroy North Village and Fitzroy Pools.
Insights: 1A Hodgkinson Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2018 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Extra spacious, top Village position
This semi-detached Victorian residence with Art Deco exterior modifications offers generously proportioned living in an exclusive position bordering cafes, schools, Clifton Hill Station and the Darling Gardens. Extended and immaculately presented, its versatile floor plan comprises two double bedrooms opening from a wide arched hall plus third bedroom/study; an expansive sitting room and adjoining dining room (both with OFPs); well-equipped solid timber kitchen open to informal living/meals; period style bathroom (clawfoot bath and shower), powder room and laundry. Including a northerly paved courtyard for al fresco entertaining and ROW access off-street parking, this appealing home features quality carpets and polished hardwood floors, period detail, ducted/gas heating and ceiling fans.
Insights: 36 Ramsden Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2018 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Ultra-spacious factory conversion, light-filled with CBD views
With soaring ceilings, authentic industrial detail and tranquil views from two sides, this immaculately presented apartment, part of the historic National Can Industry factory and former saddlery, will delight the most fastidious buyer. Close to Clifton Hill cafes, transport and hectares of parkland, the building is approached from a wide shared courtyard featuring a vertical herb garden. Entered from a wide reception hall, the residence offers a thoughtfully zoned floor plan incorporating three well-separated double bedrooms with generous custom storage; a vast living and dining room flowing to a sheltered al fresco entertaining terrace and open to a well-equipped kitchen; fitted study; two elegant bathrooms and concealed laundry. Including 2-car garaging, storage room and lift, this impressive residence features spotted gum floors, original beams, Shugg windows and split-system air conditioning.
Insights: 4/28 Groom Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2018 and 3 other 3 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
'Woodlawn Terrace 1888'
The outstanding centrepiece of 'Woodlawn Terrace', this stunning Victorian is a beautifully-renovated lifestyle revelation of sophisticated design, natural warmth and impressive quality gracing the heart of the Clifton Hill Village. Culminating in a fabulous landscaped courtyard and remote-control OSP accessed through double-glazed bifold doors; the single-level interior's warehouse-inspired space, feature elements and excellent appointments create an integrated, signature style of inner-city brilliance. Offers 2 bedrooms (BIRs), spacious open-plan living and dining, stone kitchen with Miele/AEG appliances, spectacular bathroom with internal/external showers, hydronic heating, ducted air-con and attic storage. Moments to cafes, shops, recreation centre, Darling Gardens and train station.
Insights: 62 Berry Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2018 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.
